testsuite.name: com.ultimateqa.courses.testsuite.LoginPageTest
testsuite.system-out: click the sign in link [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ad0ad1e95b88a638c89df8052b3f6892)] -> xpath: //a[contains(text(),'Sign In')]] enter email to the email fieldpraidp123@gmail.com[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ad0ad1e95b88a638c89df8052b3f6892)] -> id: user[email]] enter password to the password fieldtest123[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ad0ad1e95b88a638c89df8052b3f6892)] -> name: user[password]] click to sign in button[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ad0ad1e95b88a638c89df8052b3f6892)] -> xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Sign in')]] verify the error message[[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (ad0ad1e95b88a638c89df8052b3f6892)] -> xpath: //li[contains(text(),'Invalid email or password.')]]
